title: The Beast & The Bicameral Mind
description:
In this video are such wonders as PVK revealing the Chevron, the beastly appetite in the gospel of Thomas, two minds, a stroke and secrets of a purportedly fictional Mexican Sorcerer!

Full Livestream:  /watch?v=05ZGAqfLWoM

Sources:
PVK:  /watch?v=P5umFlzRHyI
Chevron:  /watch?v=hqf2_5SwaL8
Thomas:  gnosis.org/naghamm/gthlamb.html
Stroke:  /watch?v=UyyjU8fzEYU
Don Juan:  http://www.soul-guidance.com/houseofthesun/predators.html

Bonus Features:
Dust2Dust:  /watch?v=vEhSX9sIamM
Mourning Talk:  /watch?v=cOxAQTJEoaw

Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me: https://discord.gg/W8tnFw5t9p
Here's a Patreon for people who want to encourage me: https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz

https://grimgriz.substack.com/
